title: MVP: SMB Compliance Discovery Platform (Built with Replit + AI Tools)
description:
Built a working MVP in a week using Replit and ChatGPT for my MBA class on Online Marketplaces.
The tool helps Berkeley small businesses discover relevant government schemes and compliance requirements based on industry and size.
